subject: General English
question_en: Spot the error in the sentence: 'Each of the students are required to bring their identity card.'
question_hi: वाक्य में त्रुटि ढूँढें: 'Each of the students are required to bring their identity card.'
explanation_en: With 'Each of the + plural noun' the verb must be singular 'is'.
explanation_hi: 'Each of the + plural noun' के साथ verb singular 'is' होगी।

subject: General English
question_en: Identify the incorrect part: 'The news are broadcasted at 8 p.m. daily.'
question_hi: गलत भाग पहचानें: 'The news are broadcasted at 8 p.m. daily.'
explanation_en: 'News' is uncountable, so verb should be singular 'is'.
explanation_hi: 'News' uncountable है, इसलिए verb singular 'is' होगी।

subject: General English
question_en: Choose the part with error: 'One of my friends have gone to Jaipur yesterday.'
question_hi: गलत भाग चुनें: 'One of my friends have gone to Jaipur yesterday.'
explanation_en: 'One of + plural noun' takes singular verb 'has'.
explanation_hi: 'One of + plural noun' के साथ singular verb 'has' आता है।

subject: General English
question_en: Find the error: 'She is more taller than her brother.'
question_hi: त्रुटि ढूँढें: 'She is more taller than her brother.'
explanation_en: 'Taller' is already comparative; double comparatives are wrong.
explanation_hi: 'Taller' पहले ही comparative है; दोहरी comparative गलत है।

subject: General English
question_en: Which part is wrong? 'The scissors was found on the table.'
question_hi: कौन-सा भाग गलत है? 'The scissors was found on the table.'
explanation_en: 'Scissors' is treated as plural, so 'were' is required.
explanation_hi: 'Scissors' plural समझा जाता है, इसलिए 'were' चाहिए।

subject: General English
question_en: Spot the mistake: 'Neither of the answers are correct.'
question_hi: गलती ढूँढें: 'Neither of the answers are correct.'

subject: General English
question_en: Choose the erroneous part: 'The committee have not yet decided the matter.'
question_hi: गलत भाग चुनें: 'The committee have not yet decided the matter.'
explanation_en: When 'committee' acts as a unit, singular verb 'has' is used.
explanation_hi: जब 'committee' एक इकाई के रूप में कार्य करता है, तो singular verb 'has' आता है।

subject: General English
question_en: Identify the incorrect segment: 'It is high time we start working hard.'
question_hi: गलत खंड पहचानें: 'It is high time we start working hard.'
explanation_en: After 'It is high time' the verb is in past tense ('started').
explanation_hi: 'It is high time' के बाद verb past tense में होती है ('started')।

subject: General English
question_en: Which part has an error? 'The rich is responsible for this charity.'
question_hi: किस भाग में त्रुटि है? 'The rich is responsible for this charity.'
explanation_en: 'The rich' is a plural noun phrase, so verb should be 'are'.
explanation_hi: 'The rich' plural noun phrase है, इसलिए verb 'are' होनी चाहिए।

subject: General English
question_en: Find the mistake: 'He knows to swim well.'
question_hi: गलती ढूँढें: 'He knows to swim well.'
explanation_en: After 'know' the gerund 'swimming' is used, not the infinitive 'to swim'.
explanation_hi: 'Know' के बाद gerund 'swimming' आता है, infinitive 'to swim' नहीं।
